review: Great food and excellent service! We particularly enjoyed the pasta dishes and the attentive waitstaff.
The ambiance was wonderful, and the dishes were delicious. We especially loved the seafood options and the cozy atmosphere.
I had a pleasant experience dining here. Would definitely recommend! The desserts were a highlight for us, and the service was impeccable.
The food was okay, but the service could have been better. We felt that the wait times were a bit long, but the flavors of the dishes were decent.
Disappointed with the quality of food. Needs improvement. The portions were smaller than expected, and some dishes were underseasoned.
